briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Two Different Aflibercept Regimens in Subjects With Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration (nAMD)
officialTitle: An Open-label, Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel-group, Phase-3b Study of the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of 2 mg Aflibercept Administered by Intravitreal Injections Using Two Different Treatment Regimens to Subjects With Neovascular Age-related Macular Degeneration (nAMD).

arms.label: Aflibercept 2Q8 (2 mg aflibercept administered every 8 weeks)

summary: To compare the efficacy of 2 mg aflibercept administered by two different intravitreal (IVT) treatment regimens to subjects with neovascular age-related macular degeneration (nAMD)

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change in Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) Best-corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA) Letter Score for the Study Eye

effectByArm.arm: Aflibercept 2Q8 (2 mg Aflibercept Administered Every 8 Weeks)
